<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-------------- PPCMIPeephole.cpp - MI Peephole Cleanups -------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass performs peephole optimizations to clean up ugly code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sequences at the MachineInstruction layer.  It runs at the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the SSA phases, following VSX swap removal.  A pass of dead code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elimination follows this one for quick clean-up of any dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions introduced here.  Although we could do this as callbacks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the generic peephole pass, this would have a couple of bad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// effects:  it might remove optimization opportunities for VSX swap</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// removal, and it would miss cleanups made possible following VSX</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// swap removal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: We run the verifier after this pass in Asserts/Debug builds so it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       is important to keep the code valid after transformations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       Common causes of errors stem from violating the contract specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       by kill flags. Whenever a transformation changes the live range of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       a register, that register should be added to the work list using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       addRegToUpdate(RegsToUpdate, &lt;Reg&gt;). Furthermore, if a transformation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       is changing the definition of a register (i.e. removing the single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       definition of the original vreg), it needs to provide a dummy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       definition of that register using addDummyDef(&lt;MBB&gt;, &lt;Reg&gt;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function maintains a map for the pairs &lt;TOC Save Instr, Keep&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each time a new TOC save is encountered, it checks if any of the existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones are dominated by the new one. If so, it marks the existing one as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// redundant by setting it&#39;s entry in the map as false. It then adds the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction to the map with either true or false depending on if any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// existing instructions dominated the new one.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function changes the unprimed accumulator PHI nodes in the PHIs list to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are copying an unprimed accumulator to a primed accumulator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the input to the copy is a PHI that is fed only by (i) copies in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the other direction (ii) implicitly defined unprimed accumulators or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (iii) other PHI nodes satisfying (i) and (ii), we can change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the PHI to a PHI on primed accumulators (as long as we also change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its operands). To detect and change such copies, we first get a list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of all the PHI nodes starting from the root PHI node in BFS order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We then visit all these PHI nodes to check if they can be changed to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;TRC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == PPC::ADD8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             ? &amp;PPC::G8RC&#95;and&#95;G8RC&#95;NOX0RegClass</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;setRegClass(DominatorReg, TRC);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can transfer &#96;RLDICL/RLDICR + ANDI&#95;rec/ANDIS&#95;rec&#96; to &#96;ANDI&#95;rec 0&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if all bits to AND are already zero in the input.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PatternResultZero =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (SrcOpCode == PPC::RLDICL &amp;&amp; (RZeroAndImm + ImmSrc &gt; 63)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (SrcOpCode == PPC::RLDICR &amp;&amp; LZeroAndImm &gt; ImmSrc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can eliminate RLDICL/RLDICR if it&#39;s used to clear bits and all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits cleared will be ANDed with 0 by ANDI&#95;rec/ANDIS&#95;rec.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PatternRemoveRotate =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We optimize BBs ending with a conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : CMPI-&gt;operands())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move the compare instruction in the new BB.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We check for partially redundant case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So far, we support cases with only two predecessors</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa3e6549a5c552971ce60013e2e7c6154">MachineBasicBlock::pred&#95;iterator</a> PI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.pred&#95;begin();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isEligibleBB(&#42;Pred1MBB) &amp;&amp; isEligibleForMoveCmp(&#42;Pred2MBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We assume Pred1MBB is the BB containing the compare to be merged and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pred2MBB is the BB to which we will append a compare instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Proceed as is if Pred1MBB is different from MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isEligibleBB(&#42;Pred2MBB) &amp;&amp; isEligibleForMoveCmp(&#42;Pred1MBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to swap Pred1MBB and Pred2MBB to canonicalize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Pred1MBB, Pred2MBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred1MBB == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here, Pred2MBB is the BB to which we need to append a compare inst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot move the compare instruction if operands are not available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in Pred2MBB (i.e. defined in MBB by an instruction other than PHI).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;BI = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getFirstInstrTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CMPI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;= 2; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CMPI-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>).isReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;Inst = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(CMPI-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>).getReg());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> &amp;&amp; Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() != PPC::PHI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PredMBB = Pred1MBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MBBtoMoveCmp = Pred2MBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function will iterate over the input map containing a pair of TOC save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction and a flag. The flag will be set to false if the TOC save is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// proven redundant. This function will erase from the basic block all the TOC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// saves marked as redundant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCMIPeephole::eliminateRedundantTOCSaves(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::map&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, bool&gt; &amp;TOCSaves) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Simplified = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumKept = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TOCSave : TOCSaves) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TOCSave.second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TOCSave.first-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RemoveTOCSave++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Simplified = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumKept++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumKept &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MultiTOCSaves++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jumptable/#ae69658c09df17591f8b1c3e95b879b5ca99c267524f12efe8cf927389e02d506a">Simplified</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If multiple conditional branches are executed based on the (essentially)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same comparison, we merge compare instructions into one and make multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditional branches on this comparison.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (a == 0) &#123; ... &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   else if (a &lt; 0) &#123; ... &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be executed by one compare and two conditional branches instead of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two pairs of a compare and a conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This method merges two compare instructions in two MBBs and modifies the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compare and conditional branch instructions if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the above example, the input for this pass looks like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmplwi r3, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   beq    0, .LBB0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmpwi  r3, -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bgt    0, .LBB0&#95;4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So, before merging two compares, we need to modify these instructions as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmpwi  r3, 0       ; cmplwi and cmpwi yield same result for beq</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   beq    0, .LBB0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmpwi  r3, 0       ; greather than -1 means greater or equal to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bge    0, .LBB0&#95;4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCMIPeephole::eliminateRedundantCompare() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jumptable/#ae69658c09df17591f8b1c3e95b879b5ca99c267524f12efe8cf927389e02d506a">Simplified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;MBB2 : &#42;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;MBB1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;MBBtoMoveCmp = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For fully redundant case, we select two basic blocks MBB1 and MBB2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as an optimization target if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - both MBBs end with a conditional branch,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - MBB1 is the only predecessor of MBB2, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - compare does not take a physical register as a operand in both MBBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, eligibleForCompareElimination sets MBBtoMoveCmp nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As partially redundant case, we additionally handle if MBB2 has one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// additional predecessor, which has only one successor (MBB2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, we move the compare instruction originally in MBB2 into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MBBtoMoveCmp. This partially redundant case is typically appear by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compiling a while loop; here, MBBtoMoveCmp is the loop preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Overview of CFG of related basic blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fully redundant case        Partially redundant case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------                   ----------------  --------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   | MBB1 | (w/ 2 succ)       | MBBtoMoveCmp |  | MBB1 | (w/ 2 succ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------                   ----------------  --------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      |    \\                     (w/ 1 succ) \\     |    \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    //      |     \\                                 \\    |     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    //      |                                        \\   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   --------                                     --------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   | MBB2 | (w/ 1 pred                          | MBB2 | (w/ 2 pred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   -------- and 2 succ)                         -------- and 2 succ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      |    \\                                       |    \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    //      |     \\                                      |     \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    //</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcmipeephole-cpp-/#a8be157bc7b2bed40b10198e8b6a2bfcf">eligibleForCompareElimination</a>(MBB2, MBB1, MBBtoMoveCmp, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;BI1   = &amp;&#42;MBB1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad8c65b86ef286331d408a7a74c7b0b2f">getFirstInstrTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CMPI1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(BI1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;BI2   = &amp;&#42;MBB2.getFirstInstrTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CMPI2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(BI2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsPartiallyRedundant = (MBBtoMoveCmp != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot optimize an unsupported compare opcode or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a mix of 32-bit and 64-bit comparisons</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If immediate are not same, we try to adjust by changing predicate;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After the sequence, the bits cleared are:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The bits cleared with RLDIC are &#91;0, NewMB) and (63-NewSH, 63&#93;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can recompute its kill flags. We run DCE immediately after this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to clean up dead instructions such as this.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
